IV. TECHNICAL ASSISTANCE
The facility was not offered technical assistance.
V. CONSULTATION
The facility was not offered consultation.
VI. EVALUATION OF RENEWAL PERIOD
There were no substantiated incidents of maltreatment in care during this
licensing period.
The facility has submitted one acceptable corrective action plans not related to
maltreatment during this licensing period.
2019C0220011
Resident alleged a teacher verbally intimidated her with threat about going a
treatment program and embarrassed her in front of other students. The investigation
concluded that teacher’s comment directed toward student was a form of ridicule and
humiliation prohibited by R 400.4158 (2)(c) Discipline. An acceptable was received,
approved and verified during this interim. There have been no repeat violations of
this rule.
Renewal inspection 7/9/18
The renewal inspection found the agency in compliance with all applicable rules and
statutes.
1

VII. RECOMMENDATION
Based on inspection findings the facility is in compliance with all applicable licensing
statutes and rules and/or ISEP requirements and/or contract and policy. It is
recommended that the facility continue on their regular license.
